Package fr.islandswars.api.player

Interface IslandsPlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternalPlayer
    public interface IslandsPlayer
    File IslandsPlayer located on fr.islandswars.api.player IslandsPlayer is a part of Islands Wars - Api.

    Since:
    0.1

    Represent a database player, with all vars fulfill from redis storage

    Author:
    Valentin Burgaud (Xharos), <xharos@islandswars.fr>, Valentin Chassignol (Vinetos), <vinetos@islandswars.fr> Created the 09/12/2017 at 16:44

      • displaybar

        void displaybar​(Bar bar,
                java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Object[]> i18nParameters)

        Parameters:
        bar - a bossbar to display
        i18nParameters - some translation parameters

      • displayparticles

        default void displayparticles​(org.bukkit.Particle particle,
                              float x,
                              float y,
                              float z,
                              int count)
        Display a particle to this player
        Parameters:
        particle - which particle to display
        x - bukkit coordinates
        y - bukkit coordinates
        z - bukkit coordinates
        count - a positive number of particles to spawn (spawn in a sphere according to gaussian offset. It will stack in this method since offsetX|Y|Z == 0)
        See Also:
        displayparticles(Particle, float, float, float, float, float, float, int)

      • displayparticles

        default void displayparticles​(org.bukkit.Particle particle,
                              float x,
                              float y,
                              float z,
                              float offSetX,
                              float offSetY,
                              float offSetZ,
                              int count)
        Display a particle to this player
        Parameters:
        particle - which particle to display
        x - bukkit coordinates
        y - bukkit coordinates
        z - bukkit coordinates
        count - a positive number of particles to spawn (spawn in a sphere according to gaussian offset)
        offSetX - x offset
        offSetY - y offset
        offSetZ - z offset

        Returns:
        the bars that are actually displayed to this player

      • getDisplayedRank

        IslandsRank getDisplayedRank()
        Returns:
        the rank with the highest level

      • sendTranslatedMessage

        void sendTranslatedMessage​(ChatType type,
                           java.lang.String key,
                           java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Basic method to send one translated line to a player. It will use default label when using title or subtitle
        Parameters:
        type - where to display the message
        key - an internal key
        parameters - some translation parameters if needed

      • sendTranslatedTitle

        default void sendTranslatedTitle​(java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.Object[] titleParameters,
                                 java.lang.String subtitle,
                                 java.lang.Object... subtitleParameters)
        A more concise method to deal with title | subtitle, can deal with null label
        Parameters:
        title - a title key
        titleParameters - some translations parameters if needed
        subtitle - a subtitle key
        subtitleParameters - some translations parameters if needed
